title: Prayer potion

properties.value: A Prayer potion is a potion made by using snape grass on a ranarr potion (unf), requiring 38 Herblore, yielding a Prayer potion(3) and 87.5 Herblore experience. A dose of Prayer potion restores Prayer points equal to 7 + 25% of the player's current Prayer level, rounded down. If a Prayer cape or ring of the gods (i) is equipped or a Prayer cape or holy wrench is in the player's inventory, the restore increases to 7 + 27% of the player's current Prayer level, rounded down. It provides less Prayer point restoration than a super restore potion by 1 point per dose.

SMW Subobject for (1)High Alchemy value: 45Buy limit: 2000Examine: 1 dose of Prayer restore potion.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Prayer potionImage: File:Prayer potion(1).pngUses infobox: ItemWeight: 0.020Value: 76Version anchor: 1 doseRelease date: 27 February 2002Item ID: 143

A Prayer potion is a potion made by using snape grass on a ranarr potion (unf), requiring 38 Herblore, yielding a Prayer potion(3) and 87.5 Herblore experience. A dose of Prayer potion restores Prayer points equal to 7 + 25% of the player's current Prayer level, rounded down. If a Prayer cape or ring of the gods (i) is equipped or a Prayer cape or holy wrench is in the player's inventory, the restore increases to 7 + 27% of the player's current Prayer level, rounded down. It provides less Prayer point restoration than a super restore potion by 1 point per dose.

Prayer potions are always in high demand due to use of Prayers during combat and a need to restore points without travelling to an altar.

After Barbarian Herblore Training, caviar can be added to a Prayer potion(2), requiring 42 Herblore, yielding a Prayer mix and 29 Herblore experience. A Prayer mix has 2 doses, restores Prayer by the same amounts, and heals 6 Hitpoints.

Effects[edit | edit source]

Prayer restore is calculated with: ⌊ P r a y e r L e v e l × 1 4 ⌋ + 7 {\displaystyle \lfloor PrayerLevel\times {\frac {1}{4}}\rfloor +7}

Level Boost Level Boost Level Boost
1-3 +7 36-39 +16 72-75 +25
4-7 +8 40-43 +17 76-79 +26
8-11 +9 44-47 +18 80-83 +27
12-15 +10 48-51 +19 84-87 +28
16-19 +11 52-55 +20 88-91 +29
20-23 +12 56-59 +21 92-95 +30
24-27 +13 60-63 +22 96-99 +31
28-31 +14 64-67 +23
32-35 +15 68-71 +24

If a ring of the gods (i) or Prayer cape is equipped, or alternatively if a Prayer cape or holy wrench is in the player's inventory, the amount of restored Prayer points is calculated with: ⌊ P r a y e r L e v e l × 27 100 ⌋ + 7 {\displaystyle \lfloor PrayerLevel\times {\frac {27}{100}}\rfloor +7}

Level Boost Level Boost Level Boost
1-3 +7 34-37 +16 67-70 +25
4-7 +8 38-40 +17 71-74 +26
8-11 +9 41-44 +18 75-77 +27
12-14 +10 45-48 +19 78-81 +28
15-18 +11 49-51 +20 82-85 +29
19-22 +12 52-55 +21 86-88 +30
23-25 +13 56-59 +22 89-92 +31
26-29 +14 60-62 +23 93-96 +32
30-33 +15 63-66 +24 97-99 +33

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
15 April 2016
(update)

Half full potions could now be turned into bank placeholders.

29 March 2004
(update)

The 4 dose potion became permanently available with the launch of RuneScape 2.

9 March 2004
(update)

The 4 dose potion was added to the RuneScape 2 Beta.

A '''Prayer potion''' is a [[Herblore#Potions|potion]] made by using [[snape grass]] on a [[ranarr potion (unf)]], requiring 38 [[Herblore]], yielding a Prayer potion(3) and 87.5 Herblore [[experience]]. A dose of Prayer potion restores [[Prayer]] points equal to 7 + 25% of the player's current Prayer level, rounded down. If a [[Prayer cape]] or [[ring of the gods (i)]] is equipped or a [[Prayer cape]] or [[holy wrench]] is in the player's inventory, the restore increases to 7 + 27% of the player's current Prayer level, rounded down. It provides less Prayer point restoration than a [[super restore]] potion by 1 point per dose.

Prayer potions are always in high demand due to use of Prayers during combat and a need to restore points without travelling to an [[altar]]. 

After [[Barbarian Training#Barbarian Herblore|Barbarian Herblore Training]], [[caviar]] can be added to a Prayer potion(2), requiring 42 Herblore, yielding a [[Prayer mix]] and 29 Herblore experience. A Prayer mix has 2 doses, restores Prayer by the same amounts, and heals 6 [[Hitpoints]].

Prayer restore is calculated with: <math>\lfloor PrayerLevel \times \frac{1}{4} \rfloor + 7</math>
